participant_1.background:
I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family
i am an anime fan.
i often think about quitting my job and becoming a roadie for justin bieber.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.

participant_2.background:
I now spend more time listening to rap music and working on my Ford truck.
I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time.
I am not sure of my ethnic background, but I love pepperoni pizza!
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
i ve been married for five years.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! What about you?
Pretty good, thanks! What are you up to today?
Just working at my restaurant job, you?
I am a receptionist at a lawyers office.
Oh, I see. That sounds interesting!
It is sometimes, other times it is very boring.
I can imagine! What are your hobbies?
I like to watch anime, play video games, and swim.
Oh, that's awesome! I also like to watch anime and play video games.
What are some of your favorite animes?
I really like Naruto and My Hero Academia.
Oh, I've seen both of those! They're both great!
I know, right?! I'm so excited for the new season of My Hero Academia!
Me too! I'm really hoping that Deku will finally be able to control his powers.
I know, right?! That would be awesome!
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
